hero.title: Claudina
hero.subtitle: Supporting The Businesses of Tomorrow
hero.description: Where AI meets human potential: Transforming businesses while enriching workforce experiences

processOptimization.title: Process Optimization
processOptimization.description: Our comprehensive approach: assessing your current processes, designing custom technology solutions, and providing hands-on guidance throughout implementation

productManagement.title: Product Management
productManagement.description: We guide business transformation: from understanding unique needs and analyzing data to creating strategic roadmaps, building valuable partnerships, and developing targeted sales solutions

strategicPlanning.title: Strategic Planning
strategicPlanning.description: We collaborate with the customer to shape the product's future: analyzing markets, studying competitors, finding innovative inspirations, and crafting a winning business strategy

testimonial1.name: Guy
testimonial1.text: What impressed me most was how much we learned about our own needs through the interview process. In the past, we'd choose solutions based on assumptions, but they never quite worked out. Dina knew exactly how to dig deeper and uncover what our business truly needed to succeed.

testimonial2.name: Moran
testimonial2.text: Leading a business means prioritizing core operations, but our team was bogged down by repetitive data entry across disconnected systems. I never knew how much time we were wasting until consultants analyzed our workflow and showed us how integrated technology could eliminate these redundancies and reduce errors.

testimonial3.name: Esther
testimonial3.text: My priority has always been face-time with clients, leaving little room to research tech solutions. After spending countless late nights on administration instead of with family, I found the answer: experts who understood my needs and implemented time-saving tools perfect for busy professionals like me.

about.title: About the Founder
about.name: Dina Neishtadt
about.description1: A visionary product leader and strategist who bridges technology, design, and AI to create groundbreaking solutions. With 15+ years of expertise spanning software development, product management, industrial design, and prompt engineering, she transforms complex challenges into user-centered innovations.
about.description2: Her global perspective, shaped by work across Israel, Europe, and New York, has driven success for clients worldwide, with products reaching millions of users across 190+ countries. She brings a rare combination of technical depth, creative vision, and business insight, while maintaining a passionate commitment to learning and knowledge exchange.

aboutUs.title: More About Us
aboutUs.paragraph1:
Our Journey Together
We begin with comprehensive discovery - diving deep into user research, uncovering hidden needs, and engaging in strategic dialogues with leadership. Through collaborative brainstorming and vision-mapping sessions, we ensure solutions align perfectly with your business strategy. This thorough understanding forms the foundation for designing strategic solutions and implementation plans.
aboutUs.paragraph2:
Our Approach
We merge strategic product management and business consulting with deep insights into human behavior. Our ability to seamlessly navigate between high-level vision and ground-level execution enables us to drive meaningful change in both product development and organizational efficiency. Working side by side with your teams, we shape business strategy and guide complex transformation processes.
aboutUs.paragraph3:
Our Extended Team
For select projects, we leverage our network of vetted industry experts. Each partner is trained in our proprietary methodology and works under close supervision, ensuring every project - regardless of who executes it - maintains our exceptional standards. This approach offers our clients maximum flexibility in project scope while guaranteeing consistent quality and methodological rigor.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We're here to help with any questions
